page.title: 18BROADWAY
page.content: The village of Broadway is very picturesque and has an interesting and somewhat controversial history. The name is derived from ancient times when the village grew up on the broad way into the Neroche forest. The village is ribbon-like in its development and the modern village site is at a considerable distance from the church. Some say that this is because the original village was wiped out in the plague years, but another explanation is that as the timber in the Neroche forest was used up and the forest boundaries contracted so the houses were built near the forest so as to be close to the supply of wood. Whatever the real reasons, the result is a delightful village to live in.
